cta_intents.explore_options: Helps patients browse available clinical pathways without committing to treatment.
cta_intents.check_suitability: Guides patients to confirm whether a treatment fits their clinical situation.
cta_intents.understand_process: Explains stages, timelines, and what to expect before deciding.
cta_intents.compare_alternatives: Supports side-by-side understanding of related treatments or approaches.
cta_intents.related_treatment: Links to adjacent treatments that may solve the same problem or follow on.
cta_intents.maintenance_and_aftercare: Encourages planning for follow-up care, hygiene, or protective measures.
cta_intents.book_consultation: Invites a clinical consultation or assessment when appropriate.
cta_intents.ask_a_question: Provides a route to seek clarification without booking.
cta_intents.urgent_contact: Highlights urgent contact for pain, swelling, or trauma.
cta_intents.pain_relief_info: Shares immediate pain relief steps before a visit.
cta_intents.routine_exam: Books a routine check-up or review to maintain health.
cta_intents.prevention_info: Explains preventive care to avoid deterioration.
cta_intents.restorative_assessment: Books a restorative assessment to map repair options.
cta_intents.treatment_options: Guides patients through restorative treatment choices.
cta_intents.implant_consult: Schedules an implant consultation to confirm suitability.
cta_intents.guided_surgery_info: Explains guided surgery planning and imaging.
cta_intents.orthodontic_consult: Books an orthodontic consultation for alignment or stability.
cta_intents.stability_care: Shows retention or protection steps to hold results.
cta_intents.cosmetic_consult: Invites a cosmetic consultation tailored to smile goals.
cta_intents.smile_planning: Shares planning steps such as smile design or sequencing.
cta_intents.technology_consult: Books a consult to discuss digital or 3D workflows.
cta_intents.digital_workflow_info: Explains how scans, printing, or guided surgery support treatment.
